stress_test.panic_intro: üî¥ Portfolio will lose 30%+ in extreme crash, entering panic zone.
stress_test.advice_beta_high: ‚Ä¢ Portfolio Beta >= 1.5, highly aggressive. Consider adding low-volatility assets (bonds, cash) to reduce risk exposure.
stress_test.advice_beta_moderate: ‚Ä¢ Portfolio Beta >= 1.2, moderately aggressive. Recommend partial profit-taking on high-Beta positions.
stress_test.advice_beta_low: ‚Ä¢ Portfolio Beta < 1.2, but still monitor single-stock concentration risk.
stress_test.advice_emergency_fund: ‚Ä¢ Ensure emergency fund is sufficient (at least 6 months living expenses).
stress_test.advice_leverage: ‚Ä¢ If using leverage or margin, maintain safety buffer to avoid forced liquidation.
stress_test.advice_thesis_broken: ‚Ä¢ Review holdings for Thesis Broken signals, prioritize reducing deteriorating positions.
stress_test.advice_warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Stress test is scenario modeling only, actual markets may be more extreme. Invest with caution.
stress_test.disclaimer: ‚ö†Ô∏è This is a simplified linear CAPM model. In actual crashes, correlations approach 1 and liquidity dries up, potentially causing larger losses. This simulation is for reference only and does not constitute investment advice.
